about_the_game:
Legion Siege Deluxe Pack
The DLC will contain the following:
1. 5-Star Unit Selection Box: Choose one from Iron Reapers or Silahdars.
2. 4-Star Unit Selection Box: Choose one from Berserkers or Grayhair Garrison.
3. 3-Star Unit Selection Box: Choose one from Condottieri Guards or Outriders.
4. Unit Medal x300
5. Bronze Coin x50,000

Note:
1. Certain Units may be unavailable in specific modes during the Season Seal status. Once the corresponding star level Unit Seal is lifted, they can be used in all modes.
2. [Unit Medals] can be used to increase Unit Levels.
3. Items within the DLC cannot be traded in the game.
4. The above DLCs can be claimed by talking to the Town Crier in any capital or the Trade Colonies after purchase.

content_descriptors.notes: Gameplay consists of graphic and realistic-looking depictions of physical conflict, weapons and depictions of human injury and death.
